ovdesc.p: This application has the details of messages which are scheduled for a future date. The id for this application BL No "."Date
When the messages are scheduled for a future date in BL application using message date, those BL reference no with the Message type and activity code are captured here automatically by the System..
As on the scheduled date, BL batch process generates the messages using this details..
If a message is scheduled for a future date for a BR, then that BR cannot be removed from BL using remove BR/BB option.

desc.p: Message class that will be used to generated the messages
BL message Type for which the message is scheduled.
BL Activity code for which the message is scheduled.
The id for this application is BL Ref no "." Message date.
Contains the list of BL's which are scheduled for a future date.
This is the key to this live file.
The key is the scheduled date followed by BL.REGISTER ID (for BR level msg) or BL.BILL ID (for BL level msg) separated by a 'dot'.
Valid BR/BL reference no for which the message has to be generated.
This field specifies the type of delivery carriers used for delivery of messages, transfers etc.
